alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 9:35AM EST until January 14 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Central Interior Cumberland, Kennebec, and Androscoggin Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Freezing rain will continue this morning, making for an icy glaze on bare pavement. Expect treacherous conditions. Do not travel unless absolutely necessary. Any light snowfall on top of the ice will make the slick travel even worse.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
